mapper.select: SELECT accountId, fullname, email, phone, birthday, avatar FROM profiles WHERE ${column} = #{value};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profiles (accountId, fullname, birthday, email, phone, avatar) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{fullname}, #{birthday}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{avatar});
mapper.update: update profiles set fullname = #{fullname}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, birthday = #{birthday}, avatar = #{avatar} where accountId = #{accountId};
